author: Pauline Mulpeter
comment: need a refund wont go on my sony 3 wear its only on my phone

author: Susan Pal
comment: Hello,  I purchased this version to use on my smart watch and it installed successfully, however while customizing it I removed the settings shortcut from the launcher page and now I cannot access the settings or get back into edit mode. I am stuck in the launcher with acess two only two apps (camera and gallery) and I cannot hard reset my watch either. Is there an alernative way to get back into edit mode by touch only? Looking forward to any tips as I have run out of options.
Not for android wear, really! The developer could sell so many more if they supported android wear. I didn't read the description and downloaded it... only to refund it. Devs lost £1.50.
title: Not for android wear
